[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/stefanondisponibile/theboringlibrary/branch/develop/graph/badge.svg?token=8VHJ01UKLX)](https://codecov.io/gh/stefanondisponibile/theboringlibrary)# theboringlibrary

## Installation```bashpip install theboringlibrary```## UsageFrom your terminal:```bashtheboringlibrary```Or as a library:```pythonimport theboringlibrary as bohassert boh.do_nothing() is None```---For advance usage see [the official documentation](https://stefanondisponibile.github.io/theboringlibrary/).
